an4.102:4.3: Gajjitā no vassitā, vassitā no gajjitā, neva gajjitā no vassitā gajjitā ca vassitā ca.
an4.102:4.5: Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, cattāro valāhakūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an4.102:4.7: Gajjitā no vassitā, vassitā no gajjitā, neva gajjitā no vassitā, gajjitā ca vassitā ca.
an4.102:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo gajjitā hoti, no vassitā?
an4.102:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.102:5.3: suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthaṃ, udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallaṃ.
an4.102:5.4: So ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti, ‘ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti, ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodho’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti, ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
an4.102:5.5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo gajjitā hoti, no vassitā.
an4.102:5.6: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, valāhako gajjitā, no vassitā;
an4.102:6.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo vassitā hoti, no gajjitā?
an4.102:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dhammaṃ na pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.102:6.3: suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthaṃ, udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallaṃ.
an4.102:6.4: So ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti … pe … ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
an4.102:6.5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo vassitā hoti, no gajjitā.
an4.102:6.6: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, valāhako vassitā, no gajjitā;
an4.102:7.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo neva gajjitā hoti, no vassitā?
an4.102:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo neva dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.102:7.3: suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthaṃ, udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallaṃ.
an4.102:7.4: So ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti … pe … ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
an4.102:7.5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo neva gajjitā hoti, no vassitā.
an4.102:7.6: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, valāhako neva gajjitā, no vassitā;
an4.102:8.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo gajjitā ca hoti vassitā ca?
an4.102:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇāti—
an4.102:8.3: suttaṃ, geyyaṃ, veyyākaraṇaṃ, gāthaṃ, udānaṃ, itivuttakaṃ, jātakaṃ, abbhutadhammaṃ, vedallaṃ.
an4.102:8.4: So ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti … pe … ‘ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
an4.102:8.5: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo gajjitā ca hoti vassitā ca.
an4.102:8.6: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, valāhako gajjitā ca vassitā ca;
an4.102:8.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro valāhakūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
